title: About Me
content: I am talanted florist and decorator. I have graduated from International and cultural university of design and arts. Since first year in high school I relized that nature is most powerfull and beautiful gift in the world. I was captivated by beauty and simplicity of flowers and trees. Since then I have started to create and mastering unique and nice bouquets. My 1st masterpiece was garden of ant Ula Lowe decorated by me

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Currently, I'm seeking a full time software engineering/data analyst position in bay area (US).
